Title: Establishes a temporary moratorium on unfunded mandates and makes permanent the tax cap
Summary: Prohibits the enactment of unfunded mandates for a period of three years; instructs the state comptroller to conduct a report on the annual fiscal impact enacted state legislation has on the revenues and expenses of local municipalities.
